member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:TheBraverest.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:TheBraverest.Controllers.BraveChampionController.GetBraveChampion(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Use to get a random BraveChampion for fun and profit.
member.param: The Version that the originally request had. This should be pulled from the BraveChampion.Version property. **Optional**
The Seed that the original request had. This should be pulled from the BraveChampion.Seed property. **Optional**
member.returns: A BraveChampion to build an item set or visual display for

member.name: M:TheBraverest.Controllers.ItemSetController.GetItemSet(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Use to create the raw JSON text for the item set file OR the file itself for a random BraveChampion!
member.param: The Version that the originally request had. This should be pulled from the RecommendedDto.Version property. **Optional**
The Seed that the original request had. This should be pulled from the RecommendedDto.Seed property. **Optional**

Determines the format of the response you'll receive. Valid values are "text", "file" or "zip". "text" will generate the raw JSON to be copied into the item set file. "file" will generate the actual item set file that needs to be copied into the game directory. The directory the file should be copied into is {installDirectory:Default=c:\Riot Games}\League of Legends\Config\Champions\{championKey}\Recommended\ {championKey} is pulled from the RecommendedDto.ChampionKey property "zip" will generate the actual item set file and a .bat file that will automatically copy the file once extracted to the default League of Legends install directory (C:\Riot Games) **Please note if the user didn't use the default install directory this option will not work for them**
member.returns: Either JSON, the actual item set file or a zip file with the item set file and .bat file in it

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.type
member.summary: The name of the block as you would see it in the item set.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.recMath
member.summary: Use the tutorial formatting when displaying items in the block. All items within the block are separated by a plus sign with the last item being separated by an arrow indicating that the other items build into the last item. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.minSummonerLevel
member.summary: The minimum required account level for the block to be visible to the player. Defaults to -1 which is equivalent to "any account level."

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.maxSummonerLevel
member.summary: The maximum allowed account level for the block to be visible to the player. Defaults to -1 which is equivalent to "any account level."

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.showIfSummonerSpell
member.summary: Only show the block if the player has equipped a specific summoner spell. Can be any valid summoner spell key, e.g. SummonerDot. Defaults to an empty string. Will not override hideIfSummonerSpell.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.hideIfSummonerSpell
member.summary: Hide the block if the player has equipped a specific summoner spell. Can be any valid summoner spell key, e.g. SummonerDot. Defaults to an empty string. Overrides showIfSummonerSpell.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockDto.items
member.summary: An array of items to be displayed within the block.

member.name: T:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockItemDto
member.summary: Represents an item that is displayed in a block of an item set.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockItemDto.id
member.summary: The Id of the item to be displayed

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.BlockItemDto.count
member.summary: The number of items to buy

member.name: T:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto
member.summary: All details needed to serialize into a real item set in the game

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.title
member.summary: The name of the item set as you would see it in the drop down.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.type
member.summary: Can be custom or global. This field is only used for grouping and sorting item sets. Custom item sets are ordered above global item sets. This field does not govern whether an item set available for every champion. To make an item set available for every champion, the JSON file must be placed an item set in the global folder.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.map
member.summary: The map this item set will appear on. Can be any, Summoner's Rift SR, Howling Abyss HA, Twisted Treeline TT, or Crystal Scar CS.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.mode
member.summary: The mode this item set will appear on. Can be any, CLASSIC, ARAM, or Dominion ODIN.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.priority
member.summary: Selectively sort this item set above other item sets. Overrides sortrank, but not type. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.sortrank
member.summary: The order in which this item set will be sorted within a specific type. Item sets are sorted in descending order.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.blocks
member.summary: The sections within an item set.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.ChampionKey
member.summary: This is the Champion Key for the selected champion. It is not actually used in the JSON file but it is used to determine what directory to place the item set file in. The path is League of Legends\Config\Champions\{championKey}\Recommended\

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.Version
member.summary: The Version of League of Legends that the request was originally made with. This is used to recreate the BraveChampion or RecommendedDto.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.Seed
member.summary: The random seed that is used to regenerate the BraveChampion or RecommendedDto.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.API.RecommendedDto.Success
member.summary: True if successfully created the RecommendedDto. This is not actually used in the JSON file.

member.name: T:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion
member.summary: This represents the set of all information to create an item set and random selection for Champions, Items, Skill and Mastery

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion.Seed
member.summary: The random seed that is used to regenerate the BraveChampion or RecommendedDto.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion.Version
member.summary: The Version of League of Legends that the request was originally made with. This is used to recreate the BraveChampion or RecommendedDto.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion.Key
member.summary: The Champion Key. This is used to determine the directory to drop the item set file.

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion.Success
member.summary: True if the request was successful

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion.Champion

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.BraveChampion.Skill
member.summary: The randomly selected Skill to max first

member.name: P:TheBraverest.Models.SelectedItem.JungleItem
